Lock iterators
[Lustre Distributed Lock Manager]

LDLM provides for a way to iterate through every lock on a resource or namespace or every resource in a namespace. More...

Functions

int ldlm_resource_iterate (struct ldlm_namespace *, const struct ldlm_res_id *, ldlm_iterator_t iter, void *data)

Detailed Description

LDLM provides for a way to iterate through every lock on a resource or namespace or every resource in a namespace.
